DOC.criteria: Adult patient undergo robotassisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy cystectomy . American Society Anesthesiologist Physical Status Classification 1 , 2 3 . Medical history arrhythmia newonset arrhythmia anesthesia induction . Valvular ischemic heart disease leave ventricular ejection fraction le 40 % .
